page.title: 08TRADE IN DIPTON.
page.content:
{MR.EDWARDS.Self-employed Painter & {Decorator;Uses I.C.I.Dulux Paints such {as Gloss,Vinyl Silk,Matt Finish, and {Eggshell.He artexes ceilings and hangs {wallpaper.Works 40hrs.per week,usually {in private houses.Christmas is a slack {time for work. { MRS.SWINBURN.Petrol Attendant;Garage also sells and repairs cars.Main Dealer for Peugot Talbot;New cars cost up to Â£6,500;Petrol costs 45p per litre or Â£2.00.per gallon.
{MR.PITT.Self-employed Car Mechanic; {Buys badly damaged or scrapped cars {for spare parts;He dismantles the {car,saves engines,doors,bumpers,etc., {He stores them all on shelves in his {warehouse & resells them at a profit. {He pays Â£35 minimum for scrapped cars. {
